attributes.action: Stop all UK foreign aid immediately and give the money to uk public services
attributes.additional_details: The UK has been a global leader but over the years I believe the UK governments have forgotten about its own we have lost the great out of the UK yes we may be one of the biggest economy in the world but we have dropped we do not manufacture our own any more we may be a services economy but there is so much more we can do we built some of the grandest ships but we don't we have sold of most if not all our services over the years elec gas water etc use the aid money to put the great back in theUK
attributes.background: it is about time the UK government stopped all UK foreign aid immediately and invested it at home we are on the edge of crisis and a recession that could and I believe could be worse than the great depression

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304418

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
